full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Handheld X-ray Fluorescence Spectrometers (XRF)

## Title: 
PR10265 - Request for Proposal for Four (4) Handheld X-ray Fluorescence Spectrometers (XRF)

## Publication Details: 
* Reference Number: WS4362913378-Doc4378744085
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS4362913378
* Publication Date: January 3, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: January 18, 2024 at 14:00 EST

## Contract Details: 
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 2, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025
* Region of Delivery: Ottawa, ON

## Tender Description: 
The Canadian Conservation Institute (CCI) requires the supply of four (4) handheld X-ray fluorescence spectrometers (XRF) with accessories, installation, and training. The equipment must be delivered to Ottawa, ON on or before March 28, 2024. Interested suppliers must meet the mandatory evaluation criteria in the Annex A, Part 2.1 – Requirement of the Request for Proposal.

## Additional Information: 
* The period of the contract is from the date of award to one year after the date of acceptance, inclusive.
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the request for proposals process. Requests must be made within 15 working days of receipt of the results.

## Contact Information: 
* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Name: Grace Chau
* Contact Email: grace.chau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Language: 
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. All documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Notice URL: 
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18408736?extsite=MTg0MDg3MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
